name: 2DShooter (bensont5)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Proposed Modifications:

1) Adding more uniqueness to each level (currently levels 1-3 are the same) and make them more challenging with each level progression

2) Reskin the existing graphics (change the player and enemies to completely different looking characters).

3) Add new player abilities, such as modified ship controls or a power up.

Credits:

Created by Tre Benson
